attributes.action: Lift visa requirements for anyone seeking to leave Ukraine
attributes.additional_details: Lifting visa requirements can only be done by the government
attributes.background: Refugees from the conflict in Ukraine should be allowed to freely enter the UK .

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
